item.title: Newtown Linford probate records, 1700-1750
item.description:
Newtown Linford is a small village to the north west of Leicester, on the edge of Charnwood Forest. It is one of several villages being studies as part of the Leicestershire VCH Charnwood Roots project.

You may also be interested in Newtown Linford probate records, 1621-40
item.dc:creator: PamF
